get.description: Get a list of all projects that belong to the user.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to return

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: The duration of the projects to list. Defaults to 90 days.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order of the projects to list. Defaults to desc.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The width of the embed code. Defaults to 100%.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The height of the embed code. Defaults to 100%.

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of projects that belong to the user.

from.description: The first item number of the current page

per_page.description: The number of items per page

to.description: The last item number of the current page

post.description: Create a new project from either sitemap or uploaded file.

requestBody.description: Create a new project from a sitemap or a file

get.description: View a specific project by project ID.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: The unique project identifier.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The width of the embed code. Defaults to 100%.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The height of the embed code. Defaults to 100%.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of a project.

requestBody.description: Update a project from a sitemap or a file

is_shared.description: Whether the project is shared or not

delete.description: Delete an existing project by project ID.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of a project.

get.summary:
List all conversations for a project

parameters.description: The order to sort the results by

get.summary: Retrieve messages that have been sent in a conversation.

parameters.description: The session ID of the converstaions to get the messages for

parameters.description: Page number to return

post.summary: Send a message to a conversation.

parameters.description: The ID of the project to get the messages for

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The session ID of the converstaions to get the messages for

parameters.description: Whether to stream the response or not

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: The language to use for the prompt

requestBody.description: Send a message to a conversation.

prompt.example: Write me hello world program in C

get.summary: Get the Open Graph data for a citation.
get.description: Get the Open Graph data for a citation by its unique identifier.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the project.

parameters.name: citationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the citation.

200.description: Get the Open Graph data for a citation

description.example: This domain is for use in illustrative examples in documents. You may use this domain in literature without prior coordination or asking for permission.

image_width.description: The width of the image of the page

image_height.description: The height of the image of the page

site_name.description: The site name of the page

is_chat_active.description: Whether the chat bot is active or not

user_id.description: User ID of the project owner

created_at.description: Date and time when the project was created

updated_at.description: Date and time when the project was last updated

deleted_at.description: Date and time when the project was deleted

page_url.description: URL of the page or file

page_url_hash.description: Hash of the URL of the page or file

is_file.description: Whether the page is a file or not

is_file_kept.description: Whether the file is kept after processing or not.\nNote: This is omitted in the response if the page is not a file

filename.description: Filename of the page.\nNote: This is omitted in the response if the page is not a file

filesize.description: Filesize of the page.\nNote: This is omitted in the response if the page is not a file
